evidence.claim: Bendcare utilizes AWS for cloud services and infrastructure.
The company outlines HIPAA compliance measures for handling healthcare data securely.
Bendcare implements FHIR standards for data exchange and interoperability.
They actively engage in EDI transactions according to X12 standards within their platform.
Their services are integrated with multiple EHR platforms using standard APIs.

icp.icp_reason: Bendcare supports X12 transactions integral to healthcare data exchange.
